html.p: At the end of this sequence, and after some practice, you should be able to:

li.p: Understand the definition of linear independence.
Be able to determine whether a list of vectors is linearly independent.
Know conditions on whether a list of vectors in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] can be linearly independent.

html.p: For time budgeting purposes, this sequence has X videos totaling X minutes, plus some questions.
